string-array.name: Task_detail
string-array.item: Random browsing, try to learn to use the app
Select \"arryout\" order type and select a nearby local store
Order a large 3-Topping pizza using the coupon; customize the toppings as you want
Select a pizza from the menu and add it into your shopping cart; Add chicken wings and BBQ source into your shopping cart; Change the order to be delivered to your address
Remove all the sides from your shopping cart and go to checkout again
Random browsing, try to learn to use the app
Find a photo of two dogs, like it and pin it. Save the photo to your device. Follow the person who posted this photo. Pin another photo published by this person
Upload a picture of form the Gallery of the phone, and create a new “Board” for it
Find a photo to your interest in category “Film”. Make a comment of the photo and share the photo to new friend (me) by email (send to: kinserwang@gmail.com)
Find a photo of dogs from all your pins. Add some description to the board of this photo. Delete this photo from your pins
Random browsing, try to learn to use the app

find a hotel for 2 adults for this weekend (Fri and Sat): Find the cheapest hotel(above 3 stars) nearby; Look up if this hotel provides free WiFi and when does check-in starts; Book a room at this hotel, you can stop at checkout page
Book 2 oneway tickets from Boston to San Francisco (leaving earliest this Sunday morning).
Book two round-trip tickets (Leaving this Saturday and returning next Wed) from Boston to Las Vegas with least duration

Book a car rental service: set the pickup location at Boston Logan Airport; set the pick up date and return date as you want; set the pick-up time at 10 am and the drop-off time at 6pm; Modify your return date to be one week later than the current selected return date; reserve a car with above criteria. you can stop at checkout page or payment page

resources.string: I will add different descriptions at here
